    Function for creating a first draft of a vocabulary

    Check if all necessary python modules are available

    Creates in iota2 object
    create_synthetic_units()
    Creates Synthetic Units
    EmbeddedText
    Embedded Text
    get_coder_metrics()
    Calculates reliability measures based on content analysis
    get_folds()
    Creates Cross-Validation Samples
    get_stratified_train_test_split()
    Creates a stratified random sample
    get_synthetic_cases()
    Creates synthetic cases for balancing training data
    get_train_test_split()
    Function for splitting data into a train and validation sample
    install_py_modules()
    Installing necessary python modules to an environment
    matrix_to_array_c()
    Reshape matrix to array
    QAExtractModel
    Question Answer Models of Type Extraction
    set_config_cpu_only()
    Setting cpu only for tensorflow
    set_config_gpu_low_memory()
    Setting gpus' memory usage
    set_config_os_environ_logger()
    Sets the level for logging information in tensor flow.
    set_config_tf_logger()
    Sets the level for logging information in tensor flow.
    split_labeled_unlabeled()
    Splits data into labeled and unlabeled data
